entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 10:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 9:17 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:17 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
